General.Name: Huida Sanitary Ware Co Ltd
General.Description: Huida Sanitary Ware Co., Ltd. produces and sells sanitary ceramic products in China and Internationally. It offers intelligent mirrors, smart toilets, toilets, taps and mixers, bathroom furniture, washbasins, bathtubs, bidets, urinals, squatting pans, kitchen sinks, shower rooms, showers, bathroom units, tiles, and bathroom accessories. Huida Sanitary Ware Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is based in Tangshan, China.
